short_description: Protect Hog Bayou and connected waters in Africatown by driving investigation, monitoring, and corrective actions related to industrial contamination pathways, and by supporting the communityâ€™s goals for safe, meaningful access.
case_for_change_summary: Evidence and community concern indicate contaminants (notably mercury and chlorinated solvents) may be migrating via groundwater/stormwater pathways to the Barge Canal and onward to Hog Bayou/Chickasaw Creek; current permit conditions should require stronger characterization (including surface water sampling) and account for emerging contaminants.
